Jamie Singleton
Data Scientist About Me Web Developer

My Resume Github

I have loved math for as long as I can remember and that was the primary reason why I completed my Honours BSc. Math and Stats Co-op degree from McMaster. The co-op portion of my degree gave me invaluable exposure to data analysis and business analysis at Apotex, CIBC, and Hydro One. I am currently working for Insights3 where I analyze various datasets such as: doctor level prescriptions, sales, and compensation plans.

I'm a data analyst/scientist working towards becoming a full-stack web developer. My dream is to build customized web applications that focus on providing a user-friendly data analytics front end as well as to build data science pipelines related to processing large amounts of data using powerful machine learning libraries.

I encourage you to check out some of my projects I've worked on (or am working on) by clicking the job title links above.
